On the way, we use ideas from optimal control to formally model Ohm (via a reparametrization of the contract code) as a linear quadratic problem. The upshot: there is a relatively clean way to analyze the Ohm price as a 1D controlled price process affected by staking and bonds.

New paper with @tarunchitra, @GuilleAngeris, @alexhevans, and Victor Xu. We analyze Ohm as a controlled price process and show that the bond mechanism allows the protocol to stabilize price at a faster rate as the number of bonds gets larger. https://t.co/mVNQF6mfTO
